name: ETMars
0:
”Alexa, turn on bedroom outlet”
”Alexa, turn off bedroom outlet”
”Alexa, brighten room”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
ET Mars, a skill. It can control AXAET's device, light with wireless WiFi. To use your Amazon Echo with your ET Mars, make sure you have the latest Alexa app on your device, you have your ET Mars, and activate the ET Mars Skill. This will require your AXAET app account username and password to authorize Alexa to access your devices.

To get started, select the "Enable Skill" button in the Alexa App to link your AXAET account.
When using the skill. you need to specify by name which device to use. You can set the devices's name in AXAET app which controls your devices. You can find the exact AXAET app name in your product user manual.

Your ET Mars now talk directly to the Amazon Echo through the Alexa. You can control your ET Mars with simple statements like:

Alexa, turn on the bedroom outlet
Alexa, turn off the bedroom outlet

Remarks: When you say Alexa to wake up Alexa and say ET Mars to enter skill, you will enter the session mode, you don't have to wake up Alexa and get into this skill.

For example: Alexa, ask e. t. mars, turn on the room, turn off the room, bye.

If you have any questions, please visit AXAET website or email admin@axaet.com for further assistance.
